Sentence.value: Type 2 diabetes is a (lifelong) disease that causes a high level of sugar (glucose) in your blood.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Type 2 diabetes|C0011860]] is a (lifelong) [[disease|C0012634]] that causes a high level of [[sugar|C0242209]] ([[glucose|C0017725]]) in your [[blood|C0005767]].

Sentence.value: You can do many things to control your symptoms, prevent damage due to diabetes, and make your life better.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You can do many things to control your [[symptoms|C1457887]], prevent damage due to [[diabetes|C0011847]], and make your life better.

Sentence.value: Ask your provider about other tests you may need, such as cholesterol, A1C, and a urine test to check for kidney problems.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Ask your [[provider|C1441436]] about other tests you may need, such as cholesterol, A1C, and a urine test to check for [[kidney problems|C0812426]].
